articles.title: Asus’ latte dispenses movies instead of coffee and milk - Circuit Breaker
articles.description: Asus announced its new ZenBeam Latte during CES 2021. It’s a mobile movie projector that looks like a one-eyed, fabric-covered mini-robot of sorts — but not a coffee cup.
